Also if they are not downloadable i still have the hard drives so would they be on there somewhere ? Thanks for any help PS. will all my sent and deleted emails come back as well?

Repost from https://support.mozilla.org/en-US/questions/1439546#answer-1636510 to add numbering in first message, since I can edit replies but not original 1st message.

1: fixed.

2: solved. the menu on the right allowed me to "remove message folder header"

3, 4, 8: fixed (by reboot ? restart ? after 7 ?). Maybe the bad behaviour lasts only after changing the border mode, and got fixed after restarting TB, or E17, or X ? not sure.

5: fixed, maybe at the same time as 3-4-8, or after 7 ?

6: pending. important.

7: fixed by https://www.askvg.com/tip-how-to-move-menu-bar-at-top-in-mozilla-thunderbird/

creator: benoit12

content:
6: fixed : by http://forums.mozillazine.org/viewtopic.php?t=3113358

  • |*:root { 
  --folderpane-unread-count-text: gray !important;   --folderpane-unread-count-background: var(--color-gray-05) !important;   /* --color-gray-05 is the default folderpane background for Classic */   --folderpane-unread-new-count-background: var(--color-blue-02) !important;

}

9: i am not alone: https://www.reddit.com/r/Thunderbird/comments/17b1jtn/supernova_add_space_at_bottom_of_message_list/ but the proposed fix does not work.
creator: benoit12

content:
Seriously you have me confused.

Are there accounts set up as POP? I will assume they are. That is the only way I can see what you typed making any sense.

POP accounts use a global inbox in local folders by default. This works really well for me, because I have half a dozen mail accounts dropping mail in the same inbox. It is not syncronised so does not meet the needs of many folk these days. But it suits me.

If you want to see a POP mail account separately in the folder pane, so into the account settings > server settings. Click advanced Change the setting to inbox for this account

Note once you change it, changing it back will see the folders in the folder pane for that account vanish, along with their contents. So make sure folders are empty before reverting to the global inbox.
creator: MattAuSupport

content: Hi, greyed out: - in order to activate the button, you need to add a valid RSS url into the feed url field - in your screenshot it's empty.
